items.name: Mac & Cheese
items.description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with crispy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with croutons and parmesan shavings.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Al dente spaghetti with a creamy sauce made from egg yolk, pecorino cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

items.name: Veggie Burger
items.description: A juicy veggie patty served on a whole grain bun with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy sauce.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Tender grilled chicken breast with avocado, bacon, lettuce, and honey mustard on a toasted bun.

items.name: Steak Frites
items.description: Succulent steak cooked to your preference, served with crispy golden fries and herb butter.

items.name: Sushi Roll Platter
items.description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls including California, Spicy Tuna, and Eel Avocado.

items.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
items.description: A hearty bowl filled with quinoa, roasted veggies, avocado, and a tahini dressing.

items.name: Chicken Curry
items.description: Tender pieces of chicken simmered in a rich and aromatic curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

items.name: Falafel Wrap
items.description: Crispy falafels wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, and a tahini sauce.

items.name: Lemon Cheesecake
items.description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, served on a crumbly biscuit base.

items.name: Eggplant Parmesan
items.description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella and parmesan cheeses.

items.name: Mushroom Risotto
items.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with a medley of wild mushrooms and finished with parmesan.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Tender grilled chicken breast with avocado, bacon, lettuce, and honey mustard on a toasted bun.

items.description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.
